who-like-you.context: MACCABEE acronym - Mi Kamocha Ba'elim YHWH
who-like-you.english: Who is like You among the mighty, O LORD

many-or-few.hebrew: אֵין לְפָנָיו הֶבְדֵּל לְהוֹשִׁיעַ בְּרַבִּים אוֹ בִמְעָט
many-or-few.english: Victory in battle does not depend on the size of the army; strength comes from Heaven

better-to-die.english: It is better for us to die in battle than to witness the destruction of our nation and sanctuary

restore-sanctuary.english: Let us go up to cleanse and rededicate the sanctuary
